casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Charles Phillips BOND. No. 143A95-7. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 21, 2006. Danielle Marquis, Special Deputy Attorney General, Valerie M. Asbell, District Attorney, for State of NC. Margaret C. Ciardella, Hampstead, for Charles Bond.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of June 2006 by Defendant to Dismiss Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed without prejudice to file in the Superior Court by order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of June 2006."
